mapper.sql: Id, Name, Remark, CreateName, CreateTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime
mapper.select: {call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' t.Id', ' t.Id, t.Name, t.Remark, t.CreateName, t.CreateTime, t.UpdateName, t.UpdateTime,isnull(v.userCount,0) userCount', ' TaskDistribution t WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TaskDistributionid, COUNT(TaskDistributionid) AS userCount FROM dbo.business GROUP BY TaskDistributionid) v ON t.id=v.TaskDistributionid', '', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,1, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
mapper.insert: insert into TaskDistribution (Id, Name, Remark, CreateName, CreateTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatename,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

select @@IDENTITY as id

where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
